name: ProjectAzide.GitHub.io
tagline: Welcome to Project Azide, an open-source plenoptic (holographic) display architecture
body:
### 2016-10-09: NoCo Mini Maker Faire, Loveland Colorado
We just completed the [NoCo Mini Maker Faire](https://makerfairenoco.com/), it was great to meet so many of you.  We're looking forward to seeing you next year, and showing our progress.

Now that the Maker Faire is over, we have a chance to put actual content here on the website.  Stay tuned, and thanks for your patience.

@mew-cx

N=N=N
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
